comments.body: The problem is also extended to backgroundRepeat: if the window is heavyweight (modal, fullscreen etc.), the image takes the whole screen even if backgroundRepeat is set to true. I confirm the other behaviors, also with 2.1.4.GA and 3.0.0.
It's a duplicate of TIMOB-11269 which has been already fixed in 3.0.2 and 3.1.0.
This is not a duplicate of TIMOB-11269. Reopening

KS needs to update based on this fix.
KS PR for master: https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink/pull/85
KS PR for 3_0_X: https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink/pull/86

It is now compositing the mentioned properties.
